name: SWORDSPRING
description:
Submission for the Spain Game Devs Jam III

Use your springsword to push enemies into hazards so you can get to Mr.Sausage room and defeat him. 

WASD to move, LClick or Space to attack

Art: Ramon Matas, Uri Tartarin, Canari Games (CanariPack 1BIT TopDown)

Programming: Josep Albareda, Ian Dorado, Enric Quilabert, Maria Rivero, Uri Tartarin
